title: Induced emf of coil of wire as flux changes

content.prompt: The magnetic flux for each turn of a 20-turn coil decreases from 0.30 T.m<sup>2 </sup>to zero in 2 s. The emf induced in the coil is most nearly

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
